name: Debra Johnson
bio: Current Clerk & Recorder for Denver, leads efforts to make voting more convenient and accessible for Colorado voters

name: Joan Poston
bio: Former healthcare technology worker & former at-large candidate for Denver School Board

name: Chris Nevitt
bio: Served two terms as City Council President and on the 'Structural Financial', Good Governance, and Better Denver Bond committees. Former labor organizer and public interest nonprofit leader.

name: Timothy O'Brien
bio: Former state auditor, Certified Public Accountant, has produced over 750 audit reports
